casebody.data:
[Cite as 110612004 Case Announcements, 2004-Ohio-21.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

January 6, 2004

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

1990-1780. State ex rel. Internatl. Union of Operating Engineers v. Cleveland.

Cuyahoga App. No. 57729. Upon consideration of appellant’s motion for leave to submit less than 12 copies of evidence in support of appellant’s motion to show cause,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that the motion be, and hereby is, granted and appellant shall file two copies of evidence.
